channel.title: postgres on Aceroni
channel.description: Recent content in postgres on Aceroni

item.title: Project: Forum API
item.description: This is a database for a user-generated chat forum that is ready to be paired with a front-end UI. It uses the Django-Ninja framework, Postgres, and cookie based authentication. Intended for use as a technology forum but is suitable for multiple industries. Github repo Live site
item.content:
This is a database for a user-generated chat forum that is ready to be paired with a front-end UI. It uses the Django-Ninja framework, Postgres, and cookie based authentication. Intended for use as a technology forum but is suitable for multiple industries.

Github repo

Live site
